summary: Phase 4-5 PARTIAL: Created fully_saturated_bmcs_exists_constructive theorem with documented sorry. The sorry is blocked by upstream TemporalLindenbaum.lean sorries (5 sorries total). Added helper lemmas for constant family temporal coherence. Build passes successfully.

artifacts.summary: Handoff document for Phase 4 with temporal Lindenbaum integration strategy

partial_progress.details: Phases 1-3 COMPLETE. Phase 4 PARTIAL: Created constructive theorem with documented sorry blocked by TemporalLindenbaum sorries. Phase 5 PARTIAL: Build verified, summary created. Axiom not yet eliminated - requires fixing 5 sorries in TemporalLindenbaum.lean.

completion_data.completion_summary: Created constructive replacement theorem fully_saturated_bmcs_exists_constructive for the axiom. Added helper lemmas proving constant families with temporally saturated MCS are temporally coherent. The proof is blocked by 5 upstream sorries in TemporalLindenbaum.lean. Build passes successfully.
